channel.title: Looking for an old Play on Target episode - anyone got archives?
channel.description:
Hi folks, I'm trying to track down an old (Sept 1, 2014) Play on Target episode about Changeling: The Lost that looks super interesting to me but appears to have been lost to time. I tracked Lowell Francis down to the Gauntlet, so I thought that this might be a place I could see if he or any of the rest of you have a copy lurking hidden in the back of a hard drive.
Thanks for your time and for what looks to be a pretty cool community that I'm definitely going to try and get involved with.

item.title: Looking for an old Play on Target episode - anyone got archives?
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

I will check with Brian and Sam to see if they have any idea where that episode might be available.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for an old Play on Target episode - anyone got archives?
